QAPair.Question: What is (are) Urinary incontinence products - self-care ?
QAPair.Answer: If you have problems with urinary incontinence (leakage), wearing special products will keep you dry and help you avoid embarrassing situations.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Urinary incontinence products - self-care ?
